positional_panic.title: Positional Panic: The Scarcity Squeeze Crushing Dreams
positional_panic.description: Identifies position scarcity issues and their impact on team construction

requiredData.positionDepth: available players per position above threshold

relevanceCriteria.description: Triggers when any position has <1.2 viable starters per team and affects >4 teams

dataMapping.eliteOptions: players in scarce position averaging >18 points
dataMapping.desperateTeams: teams starting sub-10 point players in scarce position
dataMapping.positionPremium: average points difference between elite and replacement level

waiver_heroes_duds.title: Waiver Wire Heroes vs Street Free Agent Duds
waiver_heroes_duds.description: Celebrates shrewd waiver pickups while mocking failed free agent gambles

requiredData.transactionHistory: all adds/drops with timing and amounts
requiredData.dropRegrets: dropped players who performed well elsewhere
